title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士
All Great Achievements Require Time

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!
description.vi: Biệt đội cơ động cảnh sát thời không, hay còn gọi tắt là "Cảnh sát thời gian" (Người tua ngược/Rewinder) là một tổ chức giải cứu những người có cái chết bất đắc kì tử! Họ sử dụng một cỗ máy thời gian ở mắt phải "Retry Eye"! Những cảnh sát thời gian có thể quay ngược thời gian hàng chục, hàng trăm tới hàng nghìn lần cho đến khi phá được vụ án! Bộ truyện từng lập kỷ lục suốt 1 năm liền đứng đầu liên tục trong danh sát truyện yêu thích của tạp chí Corocoro Comic.

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック-EPISODE 凪-

description.en: Nagi Seishiro is a second-year high school student. He is a boy whose habit is to say, "It's a pain in the ass," and he lives his life listlessly. Until his partner, Mikage Reo, discovers his talent in the "Blue Lock," a dormitory for training strikers that aims to win the World Cup for Japanese soccer.
description.fr: Nagi Seishiro est un lycéen de deuxième année. C'est un adolescent qui a l'habitude de tout le temps dire : « C'est chiant », il vit sa vie avec apathie. Jusqu'à ce que son camarade de classe, Mikage Reo, découvre son talent pour le foot, cela les mènera jusqu'au « Blue Lock », un centre de formation révolutionnaire rassemblant les 300 meilleurs attaquants lycéens du pays.
description.pt-br: Nagi Seishiro é um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio. Ele é um garoto cujo hábito é dizer: "Que saco", e ele vive sua vida com indiferença. Até que seu parceiro, Mikage Reo, descobre seu talento em "Blue Lock", um dormitório para treinamento de atacantes que visa vencer a Copa do Mundo em nome do futebol japonês.

altTitles.ja: ストランド

description.en: Four high school classmates, not exactly close friends, share moments that are both fun and irreplaceable, yet tinged with a quiet heartache they don’t even realize. 'It feels like time has stopped.' Youth is both vibrant and muted. These are the daily lives of high schoolers—and the strange twists in between. A story that explores the meaning of a small act of courage in an unconventional coming-of-age drama (Anti-Electric Parade) begins!

title.en: Toshiue Elite Onna Kishi ga Boku no Mae de dake Kawaii

altTitles.es-la: La Caballero de Élite Mayor es Tierna Solo Conmigo

altTitles.en: My Elite Senior Dame Knight Only Acts Cute to Me
Older elite knight is cute only in front of me

altTitles.ja: 年上エリート女騎士が僕の前でだけ可愛い

altTitles.zh-hk: 年上的精英女騎士只在我面前表現得可愛

description.en:
Haru is a 16-year-old recruit of the "Black Hawk" 4th Cavalry Unit of the Knights' Regiment under the command of Captain Karen, a profoundly beautiful and fierce 29-year-old swordswoman, who, unbeknownst to all the unit except Haru, is a pure maiden with exactly zilch experience with men. Being privy to this delightful side of her, Haru secretly henpecks her and teases her lovingly, which turns her into a flustered and heavily-armed tomato. Watch as he slowly inches his way into her heart as he dodges her longsword!  

- Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/228090)
description.pt-br: Haru é um recruta de 16 anos da 4ª Unidade de Cavalaria "Black Hawk" do Regimento de Cavaleiros sob o comando da Capitã Karen, uma espadachim de 29 anos profundamente bela e feroz, que, sem o conhecimento de toda a unidade, exceto Haru é uma donzela pura sem nenhuma experiência com homens. Conhecendo esse lado encantador dela, Haru secretamente a domina e a provoca amorosamente, o que a transforma em uma garota envergonhada,  nervosa e fortemente armada. Observe enquanto ele avança lentamente em direção ao coração dela enquanto se esquiva de sua espada longa!

altTitles.ja: シロップ PURE おねロリ百合アンソロジー

description.en:
Cover illustration: En Morikura
1. Otonaninaritai (大人になりたい) by Hamuro Kei
2. Yakusoku (やくそく) by Maeya Susumu
3. V to Hatsukoi (vと初恋) by Yuzuki Ryota
4. Suriel (スーリール) by Tsuzura Ryo
5. Ohayou kara Oyasumi made (おはようからおやすみまで) by Mikan Uji
6. Moto JK to mi JK (元JKと未JK) by Tachi
7. CANDY GUILTY (CANDY GUILTY) by Yoshidamaru Yuu
8. Para ni Kiss (パラにキス) by Akitsu Kio
9. Tsumugu no Mahou (ツムグの魔法) by Itou Hachi
10. Kodomo no Mama de (こどものままで) by Iwami Kiyoko

title.en: Yume no Shizuku, Kin no Torikago

altTitles.ja: 夢の雫、黄金の鳥籠

altTitles.en: Drops of Dreams, the Golden Birdcage

altTitles.vi: Tàn dư mộng ước, Lồng chim hoàng kim

description.en:
Beginning of 16th century – Alexandra was captured by slave traders from Ukraine during one of their many raids. 
When the traders arrived in Greece to sell the female slaves, a young handsome man named Mateus bought her 
and promised to give her true freedom. 
He hired countless teachers, scholars, and palace ladies to train her into the most perfect woman of her time. 
Mateus's kindness has caused Alexandra to deeply fall in love with him, and she secretly wishes to be his concubine. 
But Mateus has already promised her to his best friend… Suleiman the Great, Emperor of the Ottoman Empire! 
What does freedom mean when you are in another man’s harem and can only look at the one you love from afar? 
Not willing to endure agony, Alexandra promises herself that one day she will free both of them from their bird cages… 
but Mateus is the Grand Vizier, power only second to the Emperor himself. 
So Alexandra must become the most influential concubine in order to have any hope which also means, bearing Suleiman’s son. 
However, Suleiman already has a son by another concubine, and this woman is determined to keep her son as the only prince.  
  
Hence begins the story of a slave to an empress of the greatest empire of all time – 
Alexandra, the woman who would one day be known as Roxelana, Empress of the Ottoman Empire.

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

altTitles.ja: adabana-徒花-

description.en: A girl with a rough life circumstances makes a life altering decision for the worst. In this tainted world, I shall live with the Original Sin of Purity…
description.fr: Une jeune fille aux conditions de vie difficiles prend une décision qui va changer sa vie pour le pire. Dans ce monde corrompu, je vivrai avec le péché originel de la pureté.
description.ru: В Моринаке происходит нечто диковинное для такого маленького, заснеженного городка… Убийство. Мидзуки Аикава является с повинной, утверждая, что это она убила и расчленила свою одноклассницу — Мако Игараси. Однако в исповеди преступницы чувствуется что-то неладное… Сможет ли кто-то разгадать тайну двух девочек, пытавшихся противостоять тьме этого мира?.. Узнайте в этом настоящем саспенсе!
description.uk: Дівчина з нелегкою долею вирішує змінити своє життя, однак все стає ще гірше. В цьому брудному світі я буду жити з Первородним Гріхом Чистоти.

title.en: Classroom of the Elite - 2nd Year Arc

altTitles.ja: ようこそ実力至上主義の教室へ 2年生編

altTitles.ru: Добро пожаловать в класс превосходства - Второй год

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với lớp học đề cao thực lực năm 2

altTitles.ja-ro: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e: 2-nensei-hen

description.en: The second spring at the Advanced Nurturing High School is welcoming Ayanokoji and Class D. The special exams aren't only what awaits them, but the unique freshmen as well. Kazuomi Hōsen and Ryūen. The two who shared the bad reputation between themselves during Ryuen's middle school days. Takuya Yagami, who proclaims to come from the same middle school as Kushida, is approaching her. And the capricious Ichika Amasawa who is pulling Ayanokoji left and right.
description.pt-br: A cortina sobe e o arco do segundo ano dessa série extremamente popular começa!Quando Kiyotaka Ayanokouji e seus colegas de classe começam seu segundo ano, mudanças são vistas em toda a Tokyo Metropolitan Advanced Nurturing High School. Com a graduação do terceiro ano e a entrada do primeiro ano na escola, as alianças estão bem encaminhadas. Além disso, agora que Miyabi Nagumo é o presidente do conselho estudantil, a promessa de transformar a escola em uma baseada meritocracia pode se tornar uma realidade. Enquanto isso, os conflitos entre as classes continuam a crescer à medida que o total de pontos da classe se aproxima. Com outro exame especial se aproximando, Ayanokouji permanecerá nas sombras, ou ele finalmente entrará nos holofotes e ajudará sua classe a subir para a ilustre Classe A?

title.en: Reborn as a Barbarian! Conquering Another World Starting from a Defeated Battle

altTitles.ja-ro: Banzoku Tensei! Make Ikusa Kara Hajimaru Isekai Seifuku

altTitles.ja: 蛮族転生! 負け戦から始まる異世界征服

description.en:
Reborn into a low-tech barbarian tribe!?

In this story of rising to power, the protagonist is reincarnated as the chieftain of a defeated barbarian tribe, subjugated by a powerful empire. With their tribe on the verge of collapse after losing a war, the protagonist leads them in a fight to overthrow the empire and reclaim their freedom.

A thrilling tale of ambition, strategy, and survival unfolds as they strive to build up their tribe and challenge the might of the empire!

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
description.vi: Cô em gái đáng thương phải lòng anh trai mình

title.en: Starting Today, We’re Childhood Friends - X Extras

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.en: Starting Today We're Childhood Friends - X Extras

description.en: Extra illustrations from author Midori Obiya's X.

altTitles.ja: 神とよばれた吸血鬼

description.en:
In a certain country town, humans and various Japanese spirits are living near each other. 
There resides another unusual supernatural creature, a foreigner vampire named Vlad:
he made this land his home and became kind of a god there, living in a shrine outside the city. 
Despite his vampire nature, he does his best to protect humans from other dangerous spirits. 
Yet sad accidents he is unable to prevent sometimes happen.

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%A5%9E%E3%81%A8%E3%82%88%E3%81%B0%E3%82%8C%E3%81%9F%E5%90%B8%E8%A1%80%E9%AC%BC)

altTitles.ja: ギルティサークル

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！　憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

altTitles.ja: ワンパンマン

description.en: Follows the life of an average part-time hero who manages to win every battle with a single punch. This ability frustrates him as he no longer feels the thrill of fighting a tough opponent, which leads him to question his past desire of becoming strong.
description.ru: История следует за жизнью героя, который умудряется выигрывать все битвы одним единственным ударом. Эта способность его раздражает, так как он больше не чувствует азарта и возбуждения во время жесткой схватки, что приводит к тому, что он сомневается в своем давнем желании стать сильным.

title.en: The Saga of Tanya the Evil

altTitles.de: Die Militärischen Aufzeichnungen eines kleinen Mädchens

altTitles.th: บันทึกสงคราม ของยัยเผด็จการ

altTitles.ja: 幼女戦記

altTitles.es: Crónicas de una niña en guerra

altTitles.it: La saga di Tanya la malvagia
Le cronache militari di una ragazzina

altTitles.pt: Crônicas Militares de uma Pequena Garota

altTitles.en: The Military Chronicles of a Little Girl

altTitles.es-la: La Saga de Tanya la Malvada

description.en:
A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army.

Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.  

Adapted from Light Novel of same name.  

---

**Note:** Manga and Light Novel Licensed in English by Yen Press as "The Saga of Tanya the Evil".
description.es-la: Una joven chica que lucha en el frente de una guerra. Tiene el pelo rubio, ojos azules y una piel blanca, casi transparente, y es conocida por moverse como el viento en el campo de batalla. Ella es Tanya Degurechaff y se encarga de dirigir al ejército. Solía ser un asalariado de élite en Japón, pero debido a la ira de un dios, renació como una niña pequeña. Tanya lo da todo por avanzar en su carrera militar y se convertirá en la maga más poderosa del ejército imperial.

altTitles.ja: はたらく細胞猫

description.en: Vomiting, poisoning, constipation, vaccines, etc., what is going on inside a cat's body at that time! A must-read manga for cat people to live a healthy life with cats!

title.en: Ainosenbiki ~Mama Katsu Shitara Mama ga Dekita Hanashi~

altTitles.ja: アイノセンビキ ～ママ活したらママができた話～

altTitles.en: Ainosenbiki: A Story of Getting a Mommy After Doing Sugar Mama Dating

description.en: The protagonist ​​is a middle school boy named Hikawa Jun who lost his mother at birth. He glares at his classmates who complain about their own overprotective mothers and wonders what it would be like if he had a mother of his own. The story begins when Jun, who wants the warmth of a mother, lies about his age and matches up with a stranger on a sugar mama dating app.
description.es-la: La historia de cómo conseguí una mamá con una Sugar Mommy, Jun Hikawa, es un chico de secundaria que perdió a su madre al nacer. Mientras miraba con enojo a sus compañeros que se quejaban de sus madres sobreprotectoras, Jun soñaba con cómo sería tener una madre. La historia comienza cuando Jun, en su búsqueda del calor maternal, miente sobre su edad y se conecta con una mujer desconocida en una aplicación de Sugar mommy.

description.en: There's a rift between Hell and the mortal world, and lost souls have been escaping to torment the living. To deal with the problem, the King of Hell released Majeh, the greatest swordsman of the underworld, to stop the wayward souls.

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

altTitles.vi: Ba Chị Em Nhà Mikadono Dễ Đối Phó Thật Đấy

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

altTitles.ja: 終の退魔師―エンダーガイスター

altTitles.th: มือปราบปิศาจคนสุดท้าย ENDER GEISTER

altTitles.vi: Chung Chi Thối Ma Sư -Ender Geister-

description.en: Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.
description.es: Akira es un exorcista de clase S que es enviado desde Alemania para investigar un incidente sobrenatural en cierta ciudad de Japón. Él y su compañera, la hermoso exorcista Chikage, acabarán a las criaturas que han venido de otro mundo.
description.id: Akira adalah pengusir setan kelas S yang dikirim dari Jerman untuk menyelidiki insiden supernatural di kota tertentu di Jepang. Dia dan rekannya, pengusir setan cantik Chikage, akan menghabisi makhluk yang datang dari dunia lain.
description.ja:
この主人公、破天荒にして最強の退魔師＜エクソシスト＞

日本のとある都市で起きた超常現象事件を調査しに、ドイツから派遣されたS級退魔師アキラ。相棒の美人退魔師チカゲと共に異世界よりやってきたクリーチャー共を撃ち！殴り！ぶったおしまくる！！
description.pt-br: Este protagonista, o mais demonicamente poderoso exorcista. Akira, o exorcista de classe S, foi enviado da Alemanha para investigar um evento paranormal em uma certa cidade do Japão. Ele atira em criaturas de outros mundos com sua bela parceira exorcista, Chikage.

altTitles.ja: 今日もベランダで

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

title.en: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game

altTitles.en: Surviving as a Maid in a Horror Game

description.en:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

Note:
- Only Ridibooks has all the volumes, due to Volume 1 of the side stories being R19.
- "No Exit Horror" is the English name on the ebook and physical Korean novel cover.

His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

title.en: Tale of a Scribe Who Retires to the Countryside

altTitles.ja: 落郷文士伝

description.en:
A scholar who failed the national exams is picked up by a martial arts master and given the task to record his life into a book. Through their journey, Son Bin meets many great people and soon finds himself following the same path as the master, as the Martial Arts King.   

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.fr:
Un écrivain qui a échoué aux examens nationaux est recruté par un maître d'arts martiaux et chargé de consigner sa vie dans un livre. À travers leur voyage, Son Bin rencontre de nombreuses personnes formidables et se retrouve bientôt sur la même voie que le maître, pour devenir le roi des arts martiaux.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.it:
Uno studente che non ha superato gli esami nazionali viene raccolto da un maestro di arti marziali e gli viene assegnato il compito di registrare la sua vita in un libro. Durante il loro viaggio, Son Bin incontra molte persone fantastiche e presto si ritrova a seguire lo stesso percorso del maestro, come il Re delle Arti Marziali.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ja:
不正だらけの科挙に落ちて挫折した孫賓の前に現れた獅子 虩は自分の戦記の記録を彼に頼む。孫賓は獅子 虩の戦記を記録することで初めて武林の世界に足を踏み入れることになる。

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ko:
온갖 비리가 가득한 과거 시험에 낙방해 좌절한 주인공 손빈. 
자신의 신세를 한탄하는 손빈 앞에 나타난 사자혁은 그에게 자신의 일대기를 기록할 것을 청한다. 
이후 둘은 함께 천하를 주유하게 되는데, 과연 그가 써 내려가는 무림 일대기는 어떠한 기록을 남기게 되고, 무림 세계에 발을 들이게 된 손빈의 운명은 어찌 흘러갈는지……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ru:
Завалив экзамен на государственного чиновника, молодой ученый Сон Бин решает утопить свое горе в алкоголе, но по велению судьбы встречает великого воина Мурима, Са Джахека, разглядевшего в нем потенциал.
«Все, что не записано, навсегда становится утерянным и захороненным».
Са Джахек приглашает беспристрастного юношу написать мемуары о его великих подвигах и заключает с ним сделку: Сон Бин может бежать куда угодно, но, если спустя 3 дня воин найдет его, юноша последует за ним...
Какую историю запишет кисть молодого ученого? Как сложится его дальнейшая судьба в этом мире?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh:
落榜书生巧遇玄天武帝，
浪迹人间书写笔下江湖！
孙斌是个仕途多舛的贫苦文士，某天在酒馆失意买醉之时遇到了武林强者——史子赫。史子赫为了让自己的一生能够名留青史，于是让孙斌跟在他身边，将他的辉煌一生记录下来写成传记。就这样孙斌开始和史子赫周游各地，开阔眼界。终于领悟什么才是真正的强大……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh-hk:
於所有腐敗的科舉考試中落榜而感到挫折的主角——孫斌。然而，一名叫司子奕的男子出現在感嘆自己身世的孫斌面前，並要求他記載自己的生平傳記。之後兩人一起周遊天下，究竟他筆下的武林傳記會留下什麼樣的紀錄，而踏入武林世界的孫斌，命運又將會走向何處……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)

title.en: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken o Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 性悪天才幼馴染との勝負に負けて初体験を全部奪われる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken wo Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวของการพ่ายแพ้การแข่งขันให้กับเพื่อนสมัยเด็กอัจฉริยะตัวร้ายผู้คอยพรากประสบการณ์ครั้งแรกทุกอย่างไป

altTitles.zh: 败给了性格恶劣的天才青梅，初体验全部被夺走这件事

altTitles.zh-hk: 敗給了性格惡劣的天才青梅，初體驗全部被奪走這件事

altTitles.en: How I Lose Bets With My Sadistic Gifted Childhood Friend and She Steals All of My Firsts

description.en:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
description.ja:
「嫌い」な彼女に負けるたび、曝け出されるホントの気持ち――。

吉沢わかばの幼馴染、梅園小牧。彼女は、品行方正で才色兼備な優等生の仮面を被った、人を見下す性悪女だった。そんな小牧に奪われた尊厳を取り戻すため、彼女に勝負を挑むわかばだったが、「私が勝ったらわかばの大事なものを一つずつ奪う」という条件をつけられて――!?ファーストキスに始まり、一つ一つ「尊厳」を奪われていく中で、小牧に抱く気持ちが「嫌い」だけでないことに気付きーー？
description.th: อุเมะโซโนะ โคมากิ เพื่อนสมัยเด็กของ โยชิซาวะ วาคาบะ เธอสวมหน้ากากนักเรียนดีเด่นทั้งที่เป็นผู้หญิงชั่วร้าย ที่ชอบดูถูกผู้คน เพื่อกอบกู้ศักดิ์ศรีที่โคมากิแย่งชิงไปจากเธอ วาคาบะ จึงต้องแข่งขันกับเธอ โดยมีเงื่อนไขว่าถ้าชนะ เธอจะพรากสิ่งสำคัญหนึ่งอย่างของวาคาบะไป...!? "ฉันเกลียดเธอ!" ถึงจะเป็นแบบนั้น ทุกครั้งที่พ่ายแพ้ความรู้สึกที่แท้จริงก็ค่อย ๆ ถูกเปิดเผยออกมา
description.es-la:
¡Una distorsionada historia de amor entre la estudiante modelo con una máscara demoníaca y la chica común que no se rinde!

Wakaba Yoshizawa, la amiga de la infancia de Wakaba, Komaizumi Komaki. Ella era una chica malvada que llevaba una máscara de estudiante modelo perfecta y talentosa, que miraba por encima del hombro a los demás. Wakaba desafía a Komaki para recuperar su dignidad que le fue arrebatada, pero se le pone una condición: "Si gano, tomaré una cosa importante de Wakaba una por una" ¡Cada vez que pierde contra ella, revela sus verdaderos sentimientos! ¡Una emocionante historia de amor entre chicas que ganó el Premio de Oro en el 28vo Concurso Sneaker Award, ahora en formato de cómic!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de amor distorcida entre garotas: uma garota diabólica escondida por trás da máscara de uma estudante exemplar x uma garota comum que odeia perder.

Wakaba Yoshizawa tem uma amiga de infância chamada Komaki Umezono.

Essa garota usava a máscara de uma estudante exemplar com boas virtudes, abençoada com beleza e inteligência, mas na realidade ela é uma gênio do mal que despreza as pessoas. Para recuperar a dignidade perdida para Komaki, Wakaba desafia-a para um duelo, mas Komaki lhe diz: "Cada vez que eu ganhar, vou tirar algo precioso de você." como condição!? Cada vez que ela perde para a garota que "odeia", seus verdadeiros sentimentos são expostos.

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり素材採取生活

altTitles.en: Living a Carefree Life Collecting Raw Materials in Another World

description.en:
Sozai Shuu, a working adult with a slightly weird habit of loving to collect raw materials, was transferred to another world by God after losing his life.

In order to live leisurely, Shuu wished for 『a power to live a carefree life collecting raw materials in another world.』His wish was successfully granted however, his magic power is strangely enormous, and his skill is really convenient? Seems like God misunderstood that he wanted to harvest materials from monsters leisurely so the power he gave Shuu was so incredible….

Nevertheless, Shuu does not take it to mind and freely uses his unique skill 【Detect】 in another world to search for materials, harvest them, eat them, make money off of them and lives a carefree life collecting materials.

The two members with the worst relationship in the group are now trending all because of a fan-taken video that suddenly dominated the social media! Young and cute husky X Cool and cold Gege who has great self-restraint?! The shippers are going feral over this pairing! They had clearly never gotten along since their debut, yet they were now forced to embark on an endless path of selling their fake ship together~
description.zh: 队内关系最差的两人，竟因为饭拍视频霸榜热搜！年下小狼狗x清冷禁欲哥哥，CP粉直呼嗑到了！明明出道就不合，却被迫开启漫漫虚假营业路~

altTitles.ja: 彼女、お借りします

altTitles.de: Ich würde mir gerne eine Freundin ausleihen

altTitles.th: สะดุดรักยัยแฟนเช่า

altTitles.vi: Dịch Vụ Cho Thuê Bạn Gái

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.ja: 都内在住のダメダメ大学生、木ノ下和也（20）。ある日、“ワケアリ”の超絶美少女、水原千鶴との出会いをキッカケに、彼の人生は大きく変わり始めて──！？
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.es-la: Kinoshita Kazuya es un estudiante universitario normal al que su novia acaba de dejar por otro chico. Sintiéndose deprimido, decide usar una aplicación llamada Diamond para contratar a Mizuhara Chizuru, una novia de alquiler, para sentirse mejor. Desde su primer encuentro con ella, parece ser la chica perfecta para él, pero ¿hay más en ella de lo que parece? ¿Y cómo se desarrollará su relación no muy típica?
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

altTitles.ja: ゴーストガール

description.en: A new series from the creator of *Rosario+Vampire* with artwork that's beyond this dimension! Chloé dreams of being an actress, but her path to success may be closed as she's now twenty-eight with very little to show for it. However, she does happen to have a special occult body type!
description.ja: 女優を夢見て生きるも花開かずアラサーになってしまったクロエは、類い稀なるオカルト体質の持ち主だった。ある時、退魔請負人（ゴーストリーパー）を名乗る青年・カイと出会ったことをきっかけに黄泉を脱獄し現世へ舞い戻った悪霊たちを退治することになって…!?
description.ru:
Новая работа от автора «Rosario + Vampire».  
Хлоя с детства мечтала стать актрисой, но отсутствие таланта всё время вставляло ей палки в колёса. Время шло, ей уже 28, за спиной одни провальные работы, надежды на какой-либо успех всё ниже и ниже. И вот, попытав счастье на очередном собеседовании, её жизнь приобретает новые краски: судьбоносная встреча, что случилась в тот день, меняет всю её жизнь и приоткрывает завесу над потусторонним.

title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Juu Kishi wa Game Chishiki de Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生重騎士はゲーム知識で無双する

altTitles.en: The Exiled Reincarnated Heavy Knight Is Unrivaled in Game Knowledge

description.en:
“You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class!?”

During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.
description.ja: 「役立たずめ……剣聖の息子でありながら、こんな大ハズレを引こうとは！」 　十五歳の〈加護の儀〉。剣聖の血筋であるエルマは、典型的なハズレクラスである重騎士を発現し、次期当主の座を奪われて追放されてしまう。重騎士は偏ったステータスに、使い所のないスキル。挙げ句に臆病で怠惰な者が得るクラスだとまでいわれていた。 　だが、エルマは知っていた。この世界は彼が遊び尽くしたゲームの世界であり――重騎士こそが、最強のクラスであることを。エルマは生前の知識をフル活用し、この世界の効率的な攻略を始めるのだった。

altTitles.ja: ブラックシープ

description.en:
A chivalrous and psychopathic story of black sheep!

Mio Shizunaga is a high school student who is the son of a yakuza clan leader, but lives as an ordinary person.
One day, Mio's father is attacked by enemy forces, and he is suddenly appointed as an “acting gang leader”.
Mio and his caretaker, Shinjun Ohga, are involved in a series of unexplainable incidents that occur around Mio, and what Mio sees of the underworld...?

Black sheep, resist your destiny.

Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.

title.en: Today's Lucky Item Is an Ahjusshi

altTitles.en: Today's Lucky Item Is an Old Man

description.en: < The Unlucky Innocent 'Moon Geunyoung' X The Lucky Older Guy 'Kang Joonsuk' > Moon Geunyoung has the worst luck imaginable, relying entirely on fortune apps to navigate life. His world takes an unexpected turn when he meets Team Leader Kang Joonsuk, a man blessed with incredible luck. Every time Geunyoung tries to get intimate, strange interruptions seem to arise. However, with Joonsuk, he finds himself having surprisingly enjoyable nights... that is, until he learns.... "Who knew he was married?" 💀 Will Geunyoung be able to resist the subtle temptations of Kang Joonsuk, who keeps inching closer—even at work? #OfficeSetting #HandsomeML #InnocentML #YoungerML #TsundereML #OlderLead #OlderPartner #PlayfulLead #CaringLead

title.en: Picking up a School Beauty to Be My Wife

description.en: One of the China's first secret soldier, Luo Feng returns to the city, becoming the most successful student in Zijing middle school! there are so many school beauties, which one of them can get into his eyes?

altTitles.ar: BE BLUES! ~นักเตะเลือดซามูไร~

altTitles.ja: BE BLUES!～青になれ～
ビーブルーズ!　〜あおになれ〜

description.en:
If you're born in Japan and you play football, you'll eventually want to wear the national team uniform! It's the same for everyone! Ichijou Ryuu is a boy whose dream is to become a Japan national team player. With his twin childhood friends, Yuuto and Yuki, their first goal is to win the Japan Under-12 Football Championship!  
The excitement of a one-on-one! The tension in front of goal! The elation from pulling off the perfect link up play! The essence of what makes football enjoyable is here.  
  
Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Best Shonen Manga in 2014.  


---
description.ru: Рию Ичиджо мальчик, которые мечтает попасть в национальную команду по футболу. Вместе со своими друзьями, братьями-близнецами Юто и Юки, он сначала стремится выиграть в национальном чемпионате младшей лиги. В начальной школе его сбивает машина, когда он защищает от неё своего друга. Попав в больницу на 2 года, Рию преодолевает жёсткую реабилитацию. И вот он поступает в старшую школу и присоединяется к школьной футбольной команде. На тренировках не жалеет себя, хотя травмы напоминают о себе. Сможет ли он попасть в команду мечты или он должен быть обычным школьником?
description.vi:
Ichijou Ryu là một cậu bé mang trong mình ước mơ được khoác lên mình màu áo của đội tuyển quốc gia Nhật Bản. Cùng với hai người bạn từ thuở thiếu thời của mình là cặp song sinh Yuto và Yuki, cả ba người đều hạ quyết tâm thực hiện cho bằng được mục tiêu đó của Ichijou Ryu. Trên chuyến hành trình của mình, Ichijou Ryu đã gặp phải những khó khăn nhưng cậu vẫn không nản chí mà vẫn tiếp tục bước đi. Một bộ manga cực hay về bóng đá và những nhân vật dành hết niềm đam mê vào nó.  


---

altTitles.ja: 元女神のブログ

description.en: The ex-goddess Izumi spends her days looking after her little girl Mika and mommy blogging. Once the goddess of a spring, her life as a human looks very different. In this world, supernaturals and ex-supernaturals — vampires, werewolves, mermaids, and more — navigate life (and parenthood) post “happily ever after”.

title.en: Record of Ragnarok: Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok: Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿

altTitles.ru: Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя

altTitles.ja-ro: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo

description.en: In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

altTitles.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

description.en: The year is 1294, and war rages. Lucas, the bugler of a small mercenary band, is endlessly thrown into battle after battle, but longs for the day that he can fulfill his wish of becoming a real musician. One fateful day, however, Lucas's latent powers awaken and his life takes a drastic turn. Under the guidance of the Pope, Lucas is tasked to become a key player in the war and lead the fight against the Empire and its agent of destruction, the Garland. Burdened by this dangerous mission, Lucas still longs for the day that he may see his wish come true...

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の魔女、始めました ～私だけ『攻略サイト』を見れる世界で自由に生きます～

altTitles.en: I Became the World's Strongest Witch: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can Access the "Guide Site"
The World's Strongest Witch Has Begun: I Will Live Freely In A World Where Only I Can View The "Strategy Site"

altTitles.id: Aku Menjadi Penyihir Terkuat di Dunia: Aku Akan Hidup dengan Bebas di Dunia di Mana Hanya Aku yang Bisa Mengakses "Situs Panduan"

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」

altTitles.ja: ヨモツヘグイ 死者の国の果実

altTitles.ja-ro: Yomotsuhegui - Shisha no Kuni no Kajitsu

description.en:
Ex-policeman Kanetsugu Nawa is a model prisoner, imprisoned for murder and attempted murder in an act of revenge for his late wife and daughter.
After being released on parole and shunned by his only remaining family, he returns to the only thing he has left; his revenge.
A strange young girl follows him upon his release, seemingly with an ulterior motive...

title.en: The Story of a Girl Who's My Best Friend, She's Acting Strange Lately

altTitles.ja: 親友の女の子の様子が最近おかしい話

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinyuu no Onnanoko no Yousu ga Saikin Okashii Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of My Best Friend, a Girl Who's Acting Oddly These Days
The Story of a Best Friend, Who is a Girl Acts Odd Nowadays

description.en: My best friend is a girl I have known since elementary school.  She was like a boy, but nowadays she acts odd. We were like two guys, but now... she tries to increase the skinship and gets upset when I speak to girls.

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.fr: Dans une certaine lycée se trouve un certain club et ses trois managers. Bien qu'anodins, des jours comme on n'en trouve nulle part ailleurs voient le jour ! Dessiné par Yamamoto Souichiro : une toute nouvelle histoire de jeunesse sur le thème du sport !
description.tl: Nakatakda sa beysbol klab ng isang hayskul, ito ay isang "kwentong pagdadalaga sa gilid," na nakatuon sa tatlong tagapamahala ng koponan na may napakaibang mga personalidad: si Nagisa, na halos hindi alam ang mga patakaran ng beysbol; si Ichinose, isang magarbo na gyaru; at si Himemiya, ang tahimik na babae na may nakakagulat na masamang pag-uugali.
description.vi: Slice of life của ba em quản lí CLB thể thao ở một trường cao trung nào đó... Để xem có gì hay!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

altTitles.en: TSUYOSHI: The one who no one can win against

altTitles.ja: TSUYOSHI 誰にも勝てない、アイツには

altTitles.ja-ro: TSUYOSHI: Daremo Katenai, Aitsu ni wa

altTitles.th: Tsuyoshi ไอ้หนุ่มหมัดพิฆาตลูกป๋องแป๋ง

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.

altTitles.ja: 魔道祖師

description.en:
The Japanese manga adaptation of the mega-hit Chinese fantasy novel "The Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation", which was officially published in English by Seven Seas Entertainment.

As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei Wuxian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan Wangji, his archenemy.

This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei Wuxian slowly realizes that Lan Wangji, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei Wuxian than he is letting on.

altTitles.ja: バース

description.en: Mao's father returns home after disappearing for three years with a terrible secret...he has found the ancient Buddhist relic, the Arm of Kannon...but this cherished artifact contains a curse that oculd spell the end of humanity as we know it.

title.en: Oshi no Bishoujo ni Kokuhaku sareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 推しの美少女に告白される話

altTitles.en: I was Confessed to by my Beautiful Oshi

description.en: A yuri romcom manga where an otaku is confessed to by the pretty girl she declares as her oshi and they start dating.
description.ja: 推しの美少女に告白されて恋人になるラブコメ百合漫画です。
description.pt-br: Um romcom yuri onde uma estrela se confessa e vira uma namorada.
